analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Auction.migrate (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#937-977):
	External calls:
	- NewAuction(contractAddress).depositForUser.value(amount)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#949-950)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#961-962)

NoReturnToken (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#55-69) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#58)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#58-59)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#60)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol:
	Contract NewAuction has payable functions:
	 - depositForUser (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#72)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Auction.addToken (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#173-188):
	External calls:
	- token[t].decimals = Token(t).decimals() (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#185-186)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- token (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#187)

Reentrancy in Auction.depositAndSell (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#408-414):
	External calls:
	- depositToken(t,depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#411)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- autoWithdraw (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#413)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#411-412)
	- token (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#411-412)

Reentrancy in Auction.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#843-866):
	External calls:
	- depositToken_(t,a,u) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#858-859)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- autoWithdraw (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#866)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#865)
	- token (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#865)
	- token (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#865-866)

Auction.migrate has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(Token(tokenList[i]).approve(contractAddress,balances[tokenList[i]][msg.sender])) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#965-966)

Auction.migrate has external calls inside a loop:
	- NewAuction(contractAddress).depositTokenForUser(msg.sender,tokenList[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#973-974)

Auction.migrate has external calls inside a loop:
	- NoReturnToken(tokenList[i]).approve(contractAddress,balances[tokenList[i]][msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#969-973)

Reentrancy in Auction.addTokenBalance_ (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#581-598):
	External calls:
	- withdrawn = Token(tokenAddress).transfer(userAddress,amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#592-593)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#595-598)

Reentrancy in Auction.claimNeverSupportedToken (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#928-935):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(Token(t).balanceOf(this) >= a) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#933-934)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#934-935)

Reentrancy in Auction.depositToken_ (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#822-836):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(Token(t).transferFrom(u,this,a)) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#827-828)
	- NoReturnToken(t).transferFrom(u,this,a) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#829-830)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- autoWithdraw (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#836)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#831-832)

Auction.isAuctionTime (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#268-270) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp < token[t].nextAuctionTime) && (! token[t].startedReveal) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#270)

Auction.isRevealTime (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#270-275) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp >= token[t].nextAuctionTime || token[t].startedReveal) && (block.timestamp < token[t].nextAuctionTime + token[t].revealDuration && ! token[t].startedCheck) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#274-275)

Auction.isCheckingTime (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#275-283) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp >= token[t].nextAuctionTime + token[t].revealDuration || token[t].startedCheck) && (block.timestamp < token[t].nextAuctionTime + token[t].revealDuration + token[t].checkDuration && ! token[t].startedExecute) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#278-283)

elements.expression: (block.timestamp >= token[t].nextAuctionTime + token[t].revealDuration || token[t].startedCheck) && (block.timestamp < token[t].nextAuctionTime + token[t].revealDuration + token[t].checkDuration && ! token[t].startedExecute)

analysis.description:
Auction.isExecutionTime (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#283-292) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (block.timestamp >= token[t].nextAuctionTime + token[t].revealDuration + token[t].checkDuration || token[t].startedExecute) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#286-292)

Auction.startAuction (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#308-340) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(auctionTime <= block.timestamp + 7 * 24 * 3600 || developmentTiming) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#320-321)
	- require(bool)(auctionTime > block.timestamp || developmentTiming) (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#318-319)

NoReturnToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#69)
NoReturnToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#69)
Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#52-53)
Token.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x20a1ffc4262a7a9fc2b29a262f82acec91258b08.sol#53)
